name: Space Lanes
description:
The Earth is in dire need of fuel, and it is your task to collect some fuel from the space lanes while avoiding the laser fire of the invisible KOPEC robots.

Space Lanes is reminiscent of Pac-Man. The player's spaceship is located in a grid-like 'maze', in which are a total of 180 dots representing fuel to be collected, each worth 5 points. Periodically, a laser will fire across a random row from the left side of the screen; if the player is hit by the laser three times, the game ends.

releases.comments: Cassette mail-order release advertised in Ahoy! Issue #3 (March 1984).

shot.caption: When the game begins, 180 fuel dots fill the maze.
Each collected dot is worth five points.
